title: Admiral James Stavridis (Ret) On President Donald Trump’s Shockingly Bad Decision Pulling Troops From Syria
text:
Admiral James Stavridis (Ret), former Supreme Allied Commander at NATO and currently a member of the Carlyle Group, spoke with Brian Kilmeade about President Trump's decision to remove troops from Syria and allowing Turkey to move into the region leaving our allies the Kurds vulnerable. Stavridis calls this a "shockingly bad decision" by the Trump administration and urges the President to reach out to seasoned military operators such as General Joseph Votel, General Jack Keane, and himself, who all see the President's decision to remove troops from Syria as dangerous and a repeat of the Obama Administration's decision to leave Iraq which led to the creation of ISIS.
